name: RISK: TV Edition
description:
Everybody wants to rule the world! Now you can, with a new way to play the classic game of RISK. Play on your Apple TV for the ultimate living room experience. Defend your territories, draft troops, and launch attacks for the ultimate conquest against friends, family, and foes.

FEATURES
•Multiple game modes available: Play Friends online, Single Player, and Pass & Play
•Global Domination online multiplayer mode available for an additional one-time cost and comes with the mobile app’s Premium Upgrade as a bonus (for 13 or older)
•Up to 6 players/AIs can battle for world domination
•4 difficulty settings for rookies and veterans
•Authentic rules – it’s the RISK you know and love
•Easily add friends and send challenges
•Guided tutorial mode and in-game help
•Critical game stats and achievements
•Multiple maps and beautiful graphics
•Fun animated avatars
•Send secret alliance or coordinated attack requests to your fellow generals
•Send emojis to express your wrath or glee as you conquer your opponents

CONNECT YOUR ACCOUNT FROM THE RISK MOBILE APP
•Already a RISK mobile player? Log in and maintain your status on Apple TV
•Maintain your game stats, friends lists, and leaderboard progress from the mobile version for cross-platform play
•Mobile RISK accounts with the Premium Upgrade get access to Global Domination mode on Apple TV at no additional cost
